isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - RADIATOR, REMOVE AND REPLACE - RADIATOR and Component INSTALLation

step1.para: Place radiator lower in position to install radiator core.
Place one side of radiator frame assembly on lower frame and install lower bolts.
Install core assembly, position and align bolt holes for side frame and radiator core.
Install intermediate cross frame over radiator core.
Locate and install charge air cooler in frame assembly.
Install mounting bolts in charge air cooler from under side of intermediate cross frame member.
Install opposite side frame, align and install fan shroud to side frames, and install and tighten bolts in side frame and radiator.
Install radiator top frame and fasten top frame to side frame sections.
With radiator supported, attach lifting sling to top or radiator lifting points.
Locate radiator on chassis frame radiator mounting blocks, locate and attach stay rods to support radiator on chassis rail.
Insert bolts in radiator mounting blocks and bracket, and tighten bolts.
Check the alignment of the radiator on frame rails. Loosen and remove lifting sling and hoist.
